message.body: Okay so Im leaving for Italy tomorrow and I just realized I still haven't given your dress and shoes back....so sorry! I promise to bring them to you as soon as I get back, but if you need them while I'm gone don't be afraid to drop by at any time just go up to my room the dress is hanging from one of my windows and the shoes are on the floor beneath it
Oh that's totally fine love, I'm not going to any parties anytime soon
